title: S15 Ep37: Quantum Science of Psychedelics
itunes:title: Quantum Science of Psychedelics
description:
Darkness Radio take a trip into the Quantum Science of Psychedelics with Dr. Carl Calleman.

Dr. Calleman introduces us to The Pineal Gland, Multidimensional Reality, and Mayan Cosmology. In his groundbreaking book, Dr. Calleman reveals the quantum science of the Maya, a science lost to the modern world that explains the phenomenology of psychedelics and altered states of consciousness.

Get the book here: amazon.com

Visit his site here: http://calleman.com/
